text: General elections were held in Cambodia on 21 December 1947.Dieter Nohlen, Florian Grotz & Christof Hartmann (2001) Elections in Asia: A data handbook, Volume II, p63 The Democratic Party won 44 of the 75 seats.Nohlen et al., p74 ==Results== {| class="wikitable" |colspan=9|300px |- ! colspan="2" style="text-align: center; font-weight:bold;" | Party ! style="text-align: center; font-weight:bold;" | Votes ! style="text-align: center; font- weight:bold;" | % ! style="text-align: center; font-weight:bold;" | Seats ! style="font-weight:bold;" | +/– |- | style="background-color:#800080; color:#800080;" | | Democratic Party | | style="text-align: right;" | | style="text-align: right;" | 44 | style="text-align: right;" | –6 |- | style="background-color:#FAAC58; color:#FAAC58;" | | Liberal Party | | style="text-align: right;" | | style="text-align: right;" | 21 | style="text- align: right;" | +7 |- | style="background-color:#A0A0A0;" | | Independents | | style="text-align: right;" | | style="text-align: right;" | 10 | style="text-align: right;" | +7 |- | | Invalid/Blank votes | | style="text- align: right;" | – | style="text-align: right;" | – | style="text-align: right;" | – |- | colspan="2" style="font-weight:bold;" | Total | | style="text-align: right;" | | style="text-align: right;" | 75 | style="text- align: right;" | +8 |- | colspan="5" | Source: Nohlen et al. | |} ==References== Cambodia Category:Elections in Cambodia Category:1947 in Cambodia
title: 1947 Cambodian general election
